attributes.action: withdraw his support for Tony Blair's attempt to become first President of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is absurd that Blair should be considered as
a Candidate for the Presidency of the European Union. It has been known for years that he has such an ambition but for Brown to make him United Kingdom's official candidate beggars belief.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
